title: Zimbabwean Champions Simba Bhora Head to South Africa for 2025 Preseason Tour: 3 Friendlies Confirmed
text:
Zimbabwean Champions Simba Bhora Head to South Africa for 2025 Preseason Tour: 3 Friendlies Confirmed Reigning Zimbabwe Premier Soccer League champions Simba Bhora have announced a pre-season tour in South Africa as part of their preparations for the 2025 season. Simba Bhora Head to South Africa for the 2025 Preseason Tour The club took to [ ]
